blog.name: aherosdiscord
blog.title: to hell and back again !
blog.description:
Welcome to A Hero's Discord — to hell and back ! We are a private RP group located on Discord for Marvel and all its characters.

Our link for our mobile nav is here.

tags: pls pls pls give me nat
summary: Welcome! A Hero’s Discord / to hell and back is a private Marvel RP group located on Discord. We’ve recently reopened some more...
caption:
Welcome! A Hero’s Discord / to hell and back is a private Marvel RP group located on Discord. We’ve recently reopened some more slots and are in search of new members! We welcome all Marvel characters in all verses. Some facts about us: we are strictly 18+, do not accept doubles, do not accept OCs, and regularly schedule in-character events. Go ahead and send us a message if you have any questions!

Check our taken character list and send us an application! | mobile nav.

blog.name: latinxavenger

blog.description: Gaby | 19 | NYC | Mexican | #Marvel blog |MASTERLIST | REQUESTS OPEN | tracking #latinxavenger | icon + header by @madeagodbleed

summary: It’s my birthday! So I thought I could post a mini series I am writing and this is the first part.
body:
It’s my birthday! So I thought I could post a mini series I am writing and this is the first part. 

Prompt: It’s the final battle, the Avengers are in a different time period and someone is sacrificed… How is the timeline changed?

Steve wasn’t ready to let go. He didn’t have a choice either. The portal had to be held open somehow.

“I have to lay down on the wire.” Steve  nodded his head in attempt to soothe his remaining teammates— minus Tony, who was in a coma on the other side, guarded by Rhodes and Carol.

Natasha, for the first time was crying, “Steve, we can finish this together” she yelled into the intercom.

“It’s been an honor fighting with you Team.”

“Cap if i reset the—“ Bruce tried but Steve interjected.

“The war is over.” Steve laughed, leaving the others wondering what he meant. The world war or the war they had just won?

Thor felt like he was losing Loki again, and still he could do nothing. He reminded himself that this ending would be happy. 

“The sun will shine on us again, brother” Thor spoke into the intercom, in a trace.

“Tell Tony thank you, and I’m sorry.” Steve shut his eyes, squeezing out any tears he held back, closing the portal— the quinjet disappearing.

When they had got back to their time, the team had concluded that they weren’t sure if the man with a plan had been all a dream of if they had known him all along.

They remembered the Avengers Location looking different.

They expected Tony to be bed ridden, or was that a dream too?

Instead, Tony was running around, ordering SHIELD agents for their next mission.

“Tony…?” Natasha rubbed her head— beginning to get a migraine.

“Hey blondie what’s shaking?” Tony smiled as he signed paper work his assistant handed him.

“Tony.” Thor’s voice commanded Tony to look up.

He turned to his crew, now serious.

“Tones… Steve.” Bruce tried to get the words out but the name Steve wasn’t familiar anymore.

Tony nodded, trying to get more from the scientist.

“What about Steve?” Thor perked up, maybe it was all just a dream.

“Steve said thank you and that he was sorry.” Natasha looked for Tony’s gaze, trying to get a read on him.

Tony tensed. Then he laughed.

“Did Steve from archives eat my açaí bowl again? God one of these days I’m going to—“

The trio couldn’t believe that after all they had been through, Tony would still hold a grudge but then Bruce saw the paper work.

“The Steve Rogers AIDS Foundation.” Bruce breathes out.

Tony nodded. “Yeah, I spoke at the launch in Brooklyn last week. He’s the guy my dad worked with for a really long time before Dad died of cancer. You were all there remember?”

Thor was about to say something. Natasha held him back.

“Right. Carry on Stark.”

Ahh. I really hope this mini series gets the love I hope it deserves. Please like, follow, tag, and reblog if you can! It really helps me out. If you wanna be tagged in the next update DM me lmao. Check out my slightly outdated MASTERLIST too. Thank you all!! 💖

blog.name: bringbackgenisvellandphylavell
blog.title: Bring back Genis and Phyla Vell
blog.description:
Site dedicated to all things Genis-Vell and Phyla-Vell. Former Captains Marvel and son and daughter of the original one, Mar-Vell. They were killed off very soon by Marvel and they deserve a second chance, we don't ask about a new chance as Captains Marvel but to come back to the Cosmic Marvel Universe (Quasar, Photon, Legacy, Martyr, whatever). 

Posts about Genis and Phyla. Mar-Vell, Rick Jones, Guardians of the Galaxy, Adam Warlock, Quasar, Thanos, Starlin stuff, some Avengers and a lot of Cosmic stuff. Welcome!

summary: 10 things that we won’t see in Captain Marvel the movie
title: 10 things that we won’t see in Captain Marvel the movie
body:
1. The Kree Supreme Intelligence

It seems that it won’t be the ruler of the Kree empire and we won’t see the Supremor.

2. The  Omni-Wave Projector

A key point of the original Kree-Skrull War was this machine. The Omni-Wave Projector was used as a kree communication technology that could be used as a weapon too.


3. The Superskrull

We will see Skrulls which is great, but we won’t see Kl’rt and the powers of the Fantastic Four, maybe in the future with Fox’s characters returning to Marvel Studios/Disney, but we won’t see one of the most important Skrulls.

4. The Negabands

A key power source for Mar-Vell and other Captains Marvel, these bracelets powered by the energies of the The Negative Zone as well as the wielder’s own psionic energies. The bands can teleport you to the negative zone, interstellar flight, resistance to the vacuum of the space,  super-human strength, universal translation,  ability to manipulate, absorb and project various types of energy, trade places with other wielders of other nega bands (Rick Jones), and some more.

Regular Krees can’t fly, have super strength or absorb and project energy as the “Life of Captain Marvel” seems to show. Previous Captains Marvel could do this because of the Negabands and other processes that Mar-Vell suffered in his adventures. Moreover, Genis and Phyla were half Titans-Eternals, so they were more powerful than his father.


5. The  Negative Zone

An important part of Mar-Vell as Captain Marvel was his time in the Negative Zone and the connection of the nega bands with this dimension. With Fox deal not over yet we won’t see it in this first movie. The could show the quantum universe as Genis-Vell was connected to the microverse after a connection between his negabands a Drax’s bands.

6. Cosmic Awareness

Eon gave this power to Mar-Vell, Genis and Phyla, which makes them protectors of the universe (as Quasar).

7. Rick Jones

Rick Jones, important sidekick of Hulk/Bruce Banner, the Avengers, Captain America, Rom, and part of Mar-Vell and Genis’ adventures. His involvement in the Marvel Universe helped create the Hulk, the Avengers or win the Kree-Skrull War. He even became the second Captain Marvel of the Ultimate Universe.

8. Captain Mar-Vell

I hope to be wrong but it seems that Jude Law is going to play Yon-Rogg, so we won’t even get Mar-Vell there, which makes it difficult for…

9. Genis-Vell

Legacy, Captain Marvel or Photon, if we don’t get Mar-Vell in the movie it seems quite difficult to present Genis or his sister.

10. Phyla Vell

Phyla-Vell, Captain Marvel, Quasar and Martyr, as the same with Genis, If Mar-Vell is not in the movie, it would be difficult for Phyla to be there, but… she may have a chance with the Guardians of the Galaxy.

I hope to be wrong with many of these things. 

What do you think? Some other things that you would like to see in the movie but seems unlikely?

blog.name: captainmarvelthekree
blog.title: Captain Marvel the Kree
blog.description: Tribute blog to Marvel's (Kree) Captains Marvel: Mar-Vell, Genis-Vell, Carol Danvers, Phyla-Vell, Noh-Varr and associates (so, also Guardians of the Galaxy, Rick Jones, Thanos, Adam Warlock, Quasar, The Avengers and Cosmic Stuff in general, Hulkling and the Young Avengers, etc).

summary: Iron MARVEL (Carol Danvers x Tony Stark) shippers please reblog this post.  And before you open your mouth, they are canon in...
body:
Iron MARVEL (Carol Danvers x Tony Stark) shippers please reblog this post. 

And before you open your mouth, they are canon in one of the comic series.

blog.name: bringbackgenisvellandphylavell
blog.title: Bring back Genis and Phyla Vell
blog.description:
Site dedicated to all things Genis-Vell and Phyla-Vell. Former Captains Marvel and son and daughter of the original one, Mar-Vell. They were killed off very soon by Marvel and they deserve a second chance, we don't ask about a new chance as Captains Marvel but to come back to the Cosmic Marvel Universe (Quasar, Photon, Legacy, Martyr, whatever). 

Posts about Genis and Phyla. Mar-Vell, Rick Jones, Guardians of the Galaxy, Adam Warlock, Quasar, Thanos, Starlin stuff, some Avengers and a lot of Cosmic stuff. Welcome!

summary: Kibbles 'n' Bits 12/20/18: I did not fall asleep during Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
title: Kibbles 'n' Bits 12/20/18: I did not fall asleep during Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
body:
Kibbles ‘n’ Bits 12/20/18: I did not fall asleep during Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse

§ Nice Art: I got to see Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse the other day at the early bird IMAX matinée and here is a very quick capsule review:

Did I fell asleep? Fully alert and ALIVE ALIVE ALIVE during the whole thing!!!!

Did I Like the score: I think this was maybe the BEST score ever in a Marvel movie, from the new songs to the sting when the Prowler was unmasked.

What else: Like I said on…

View On WordPress

summary: Hasbro Shares The official Images And Info For Those Two Exclusive New Captain Marvel, Marvel Legends Six Inch Figures. Leaked...
caption:
Hasbro Shares The official Images And Info For Those Two Exclusive New Captain Marvel, Marvel Legends Six Inch Figures.

Leaked out a little early yesterday by several sources and this post we also agreed to be held under embargo for. However, now we can share so here’s the details on these two:

  • Marvel Captain Marvel 6-Inch Legends Binary Form Figure (Red Flame) Retail Price: $19.99/Available: January 2019 Available exclusively at Walmart
  • Marvel Captain Marvel 6-Inch Legends Starforce Figure (Green) Retail Price: $19.99/Available: January 2019 Available exclusively at Target

Starforce version seems the strongest to me, but I’m sure others will like the Binary version too. What’s your preference? We’ll discuss on the next episode of ‘The Six Inch Show’.

summary: Marvel Tsum Tsum #1 (2016)
title: Marvel Tsum Tsum #1 (2016)
body: #MarvelTsumTsum #1 (2016) #TerryDodson Fried Pie Variant #CaptainMarvel Cover, #JacobChabot Story, #DavidBaldeon Pencils In case you’ve been living under a rock, #TsumTsums are HUGE! Well, not LITERALLY (they’re actually pretty tiny) but these seemingly cute and cuddly creatures are sweeping the globe! So what happens when these pint-sized piles of fur find their way into the Marvel Universe? After a crate of them falls to Earth en route to THE COLLECTOR, one small group of Brooklyn teenagers will find out! Featuring all of your favorite Marvel heroes and villains, this is sure to be TSUM-thing you won’t want to miss! BUY NOW

tags: what is the point if we have already seen everyone die?
summary: Sorry Captain Marvel
title: Sorry Captain Marvel
body: So I finally saw Ant Man and the Wasp and it was fairly decent, but there is a reason why I didn’t see it in cinema and why I am in no way excited to see Captain Marvel. It’s hard to get into a story when you are only waiting for the moment for everybody to turn into ashes. Nothing has consequences. I don’t really care what Scott or anybody else does. I saw the actual characters that I care about turn into dust. At the moment I only want to see Tony Stark raining hell on Thanos for killing Loki, Stephen and Peter (screw the rest of the universe). That’s the problem when you give us a movie after Infinity War and before Endgame. During the entire movie I am merely thinking ‘Are they fighting Thanos right now? Is Thor already on Earth? Is Doctor Strange still alive?’. By now I am only interested in how Tony Stark is going back to Earth and I really don’t feel the need watch another movie that is taking place before Infinity War when I have already seen the Mad Titan snapping the greatest character’s neck and half the universe turning into dust. I want to see where we go from there. So, sorry Captain Marvel, but I don’t really care

That’s the problem when you give us a movie after Infinity War and before Endgame. During the entire movie I am merely thinking ‘Are they fighting Thanos right now? Is Thor already on Earth? Is Doctor Strange still alive?’. By now I am only interested in how Tony Stark is going back to Earth and I really don’t feel the need watch another movie that is taking place before Infinity War when I have already seen the Mad Titan snapping the greatest character’s neck and half the universe turning into dust. I want to see where we go from there. So, sorry Captain Marvel, but I don’t really care

It’s hard to get into a story when you are only waiting for the moment for everybody to turn into ashes. Nothing has consequences. I don’t really care what Scott or anybody else does. I saw the actual characters that I care about turn into dust. At the moment I only want to see Tony Stark raining hell on Thanos for killing Loki, Stephen and Peter (screw the rest of the universe). That’s the problem when you give us a movie after Infinity War and before Endgame. During the entire movie I am merely thinking ‘Are they fighting Thanos right now? Is Thor already on Earth? Is Doctor Strange still alive?’. By now I am only interested in how Tony Stark is going back to Earth and I really don’t feel the need watch another movie that is taking place before Infinity War when I have already seen the Mad Titan snapping the greatest character’s neck and half the universe turning into dust. I want to see where we go from there. So, sorry Captain Marvel, but I don’t really care
trail.content: So I finally saw Ant Man and the Wasp and it was fairly decent, but there is a reason why I didn’t see it in cinema and why I am in no way excited to see Captain Marvel. It’s hard to get into a story when you are only waiting for the moment for everybody to turn into ashes. Nothing has consequences. I don’t really care what Scott or anybody else does. I saw the actual characters that I care about turn into dust. At the moment I only want to see Tony Stark raining hell on Thanos for killing Loki, Stephen and Peter (screw the rest of the universe). That’s the problem when you give us a movie after Infinity War and before Endgame. During the entire movie I am merely thinking ‘Are they fighting Thanos right now? Is Thor already on Earth? Is Doctor Strange still alive?’. By now I am only interested in how Tony Stark is going back to Earth and I really don’t feel the need watch another movie that is taking place before Infinity War when I have already seen the Mad Titan snapping the greatest character’s neck and half the universe turning into dust. I want to see where we go from there. So, sorry Captain Marvel, but I don’t really care
